A first teaser for Peaky Blinders star Cillian Murphy's anticipated movie Oppenheimer has been released.
The short clip from Christopher Nolan's new film, which was released today (July 28), sees a … [+1956 chars]

articles.title: ITV Emmerdale's Rosie Bentham declares love for co-star as she celebrates special day - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: The Gabby Thomas actress swooned over her co-star
articles.content:
Emmerdale's Rosie Bentham has issued a heartfelt tribute to her co-star as she celebrates her birthday.
 The actress has played Gabby Thomas in the fictional Yorkshire village since 2016. Away from … [+2014 chars]
